verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Command <S%H6680><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto them, My offering <S%H7133><s%>, and my bread <S%H3899><s%> for my sacrifices made by fire <S%H801><s%>, for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savour <S%H7381><s%> unto me, shall ye observe <S%H8104><s%> to offer <S%H7126><s%> unto me in their due season <S%H4150><s%>. a sweet: Heb. a savour of my rest

And thou shalt say <S%H559><s%> unto them, This is the offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> which ye shall offer <S%H7126><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; two <S%H8147><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> without spot <S%H8549><s%> day by day <S%H3117><s%>, for a continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>. day by day: Heb. in a day

The one <S%H259><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> shalt thou offer <S%H6213><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and the other <S%H8145><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> shalt thou offer <S%H6213><s%> at even <S%H6153><s%>; at even: Heb. between the two evenings

And a tenth <S%H6224><s%> part of an ephah <S%H374><s%> of flour <S%H5560><s%> for a meat offering <S%H4503><s%>, mingled <S%H1101><s%> with the fourth <S%H7243><s%> part of an hin <S%H1969><s%> of beaten <S%H3795><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>.

It is a continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, which was ordained <S%H6213><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savour <S%H7381><s%>, a sacrifice made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

And the drink offering <S%H5262><s%> thereof shall be the fourth <S%H7243><s%> part of an hin <S%H1969><s%> for the one <S%H259><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%>: in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place shalt thou cause the strong wine <S%H7941><s%> to be poured <S%H5258><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> for a drink offering <S%H5262><s%>.

And the other <S%H8145><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> shalt thou offer <S%H6213><s%> at even <S%H6153><s%>: as the meat offering <S%H4503><s%> of the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and as the drink offering <S%H5262><s%> thereof, thou shalt offer <S%H6213><s%> it, a sacrifice made by fire <S%H801><s%>, of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savour <S%H7381><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

And on the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> without spot <S%H8549><s%>, and two <S%H8147><s%> tenth <S%H6241><s%> deals of flour <S%H5560><s%> for a meat offering <S%H4503><s%>, mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>, and the drink offering <S%H5262><s%> thereof:
This is the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> of every sabbath <S%H7676><s%>, beside the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, and his drink offering <S%H5262><s%>.

And in the beginnings <S%H7218><s%> of your months <S%H2320><s%> ye shall offer <S%H7126><s%> a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; two <S%H8147><s%> young <S%H1241><s%> bullocks <S%H6499><s%>, and one <S%H259><s%> ram <S%H352><s%>, seven <S%H7651><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> without spot <S%H8549><s%>;

And three <S%H7969><s%> tenth deals <S%H6241><s%> of flour <S%H5560><s%> for a meat offering <S%H4503><s%>, mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>, for one <S%H259><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%>; and two <S%H8147><s%> tenth <S%H6241><s%> deals of flour <S%H5560><s%> for a meat offering <S%H4503><s%>, mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>, for one <S%H259><s%> ram <S%H352><s%>;

And a several tenth deal <S%H6241><s%> of flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%> for a meat offering <S%H4503><s%> unto one <S%H259><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%>; for a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savour <S%H7381><s%>, a sacrifice made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

And their drink offerings <S%H5262><s%> shall be half <S%H2677><s%> an hin <S%H1969><s%> of wine <S%H3196><s%> unto a bullock <S%H6499><s%>, and the third <S%H7992><s%> part of an hin <S%H1969><s%> unto a ram <S%H352><s%>, and a fourth <S%H7243><s%> part of an hin <S%H1969><s%> unto a lamb <S%H3532><s%>: this is the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> of every month <S%H2320><s%> throughout the months <S%H2320><s%> of the year <S%H8141><s%>.

And one <S%H259><s%> kid <S%H8163><s%> of the goats <S%H5795><s%> for a sin offering <S%H2403><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall be offered <S%H6213><s%>, beside the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, and his drink offering <S%H5262><s%>.
And in the fourteenth <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> is the passover <S%H6453><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

And in the fifteenth <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of this month <S%H2320><s%> is the feast <S%H2282><s%>: seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shall unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%> be eaten <S%H398><s%>.
In the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be an holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation <S%H4744><s%>; ye shall do <S%H6213><s%> no manner of servile <S%H5656><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> therein:

But ye shall offer <S%H7126><s%> a sacrifice made by fire <S%H801><s%> for a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; two <S%H8147><s%> young <S%H1241><s%> bullocks <S%H6499><s%>, and one <S%H259><s%> ram <S%H352><s%>, and seven <S%H7651><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>: they shall be unto you without blemish <S%H8549><s%>:

And their meat offering <S%H4503><s%> shall be of flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>: three <S%H7969><s%> tenth deals <S%H6241><s%> shall ye offer <S%H6213><s%> for a bullock <S%H6499><s%>, and two <S%H8147><s%> tenth deals <S%H6241><s%> for a ram <S%H352><s%>;
A several tenth deal <S%H6241><s%> shalt thou offer <S%H6213><s%> for every <S%H259><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%>, throughout the seven <S%H7651><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%>:
And one <S%H259><s%> goat <S%H8163><s%> for a sin offering <S%H2403><s%>, to make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for you.
Ye shall offer <S%H6213><s%> these beside the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, which is for a continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>.

After this manner ye shall offer <S%H6213><s%> daily <S%H3117><s%>, throughout the seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, the meat <S%H3899><s%> of the sacrifice made by fire <S%H801><s%>, of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savour <S%H7381><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: it shall be offered <S%H6213><s%> beside the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, and his drink offering <S%H5262><s%>.
And on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> ye shall have an holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation <S%H4744><s%>; ye shall do <S%H6213><s%> no servile <S%H5656><s%> work <S%H4399><s%>.

Also in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the firstfruits <S%H1061><s%>, when ye bring <S%H7126><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> meat offering <S%H4503><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, after your weeks <S%H7620><s%> be out, ye shall have an holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation <S%H4744><s%>; ye shall do <S%H6213><s%> no servile <S%H5656><s%> work <S%H4399><s%>:

But ye shall offer <S%H7126><s%> the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savour <S%H7381><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; two <S%H8147><s%> young <S%H1241><s%> bullocks <S%H6499><s%>, one <S%H259><s%> ram <S%H352><s%>, seven <S%H7651><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>;

And their meat offering <S%H4503><s%> of flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>, three <S%H7969><s%> tenth deals <S%H6241><s%> unto one <S%H259><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%>, two <S%H8147><s%> tenth deals <S%H6241><s%> unto one <S%H259><s%> ram <S%H352><s%>,
A several tenth deal <S%H6241><s%> unto one <S%H259><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%>, throughout the seven <S%H7651><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%>;
And one <S%H259><s%> kid <S%H8163><s%> of the goats <S%H5795><s%>, to make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for you.

Ye shall offer <S%H6213><s%> them beside the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, and his meat offering <S%H4503><s%>, (they shall be unto you without blemish <S%H8549><s%>) and their drink offerings <S%H5262><s%>.
